channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My Second Post
item.description: I am editing and hopefully saving and publishing this post from my iPad using the Working Copy app. It’s actually really quite good. I just type in the text editor, save it with a commit, and push. That’s it. Here goes my first try.

item.title: “My Third Post”
item.description: I don’t know how to write. But maybe my awesome hubby will help me.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Well, I’ve been thinking about writing for a while and I need to just do it. This is it. My real first disciplined try. Here goes! Jiayou!
